overview.en: CEN (“GLOD Token is a global general certificate of property rights created by GLODpurchase company based on block chain technology.It is also an application of public chain wallet for cryptographic digital currency. GLOD Token takes

as the transaction carrier. It improves high-frequency intelligent trading based on blockchain distributed accounting technology, innovates consensus mechanism to improve data processing efficiency, and finally builds a decentralized security wallet to ensure the safety of users'

. And encryption guarantees that stored money cannot be tampered with.Meanwhile, what's more important is that GLOD Token property Token is issued under the background of physical assets, which is different from BTC, ETH and other virtual digital currencies, thus guaranteeing the security of conservative investors' funds.
overview.zh: GLOD Token是由GLOD购落地公司基于区块链技术打造的全球产权通证，也是加密数字货币应用公链钱包。GLOD Token以“购落地I号” 为交易载体，基于区块链分布式记账技术完善高频智能交易，加密技术保证储存货币不可篡改，创新共识机制提高数据处理效率，最终搭建一个去中心化的安全钱包， 保证用户“ 资金”安全。 同时，更重要一点是：GLOD Token产权通证是以实物资产托底发行的TOKEN，有别于BTC、ETH等虚拟数字货币， 从而保障了保守型投资者资金安全。
